price: নিশ্চয় আমি মানুহক সৃষ্টি কৰিছোঁ মাটিৰ উপাদানৰ পৰা,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min sulālatin min ṭīnin
